name: 2048 Browser Game
summary: Created a browser version of the popular mobile game, where you slide tiles to combine numbers.

name: Dengue Heatmap
summary: Built with react and using the NEA api to circle out areas of high dengue risk, and notify users.

name: Expense tracker
summary: Built with Bulma, Express and MongoDB, this expense tracker helps individuals manage finance.

name: Barcode Scanner Mobile App
summary: Built with react native, this barcode scanner is made for businesses to use as a mobile POS
